Replace.Text: I have more important things to attend to than this.
If you don't mind, we can join forces. This is good for all of us.
It seems that you are a smart person.
If you change your mind, feel free to come to me anytime.
...Do you not hesitate to do this? It's really troublesome...
That's the situation, let's get this troublesome matter out of the way as soon as possible.
The valley of Hinnom welcomes your messengers.
It is not my job to receive messengers.
The Hall of Demons has just sent a team of representatives, please receive them well.
You are one of the most troublesome things that have ever happened to me. (condemns you)
Welcome, I'm Hina Kurasaki, the chairman of the discipline committee of Xinnen Valley... yes, the discipline committee, not the student council.
Hinnom Valley welcomes you as guests.
really not bad. Maybe some students will come to play, let's talk about it later.
Sharing some inside information is key to demonstrating trust, don't you think?
The students in Hinnom Valley are actually good kids...
I don't want to waste my energy dealing with these troubles, don't bother me.
Hinnom Valley students are actually good kids, if you don't mind...
Provoking the Valley of Hinnom was not a conscious choice.
...Finally, I can take a good rest...
Well, let's talk about it another day.

Obtain [ICON_Gold] gold coins, the amount is equivalent to 1/4 of the [ICON_Faith] faith output of each round, or the [ICON_Culture] cultural value required by the just completed municipality. Cities with no garrison or councilor headquarters -15 loyalty per turn. Colleges cannot be built, and each citizen will produce an additional 0.2 [ICON_Science] technology value and [ICON_Culture] culture value.

+15 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting against the Free City, and the masterpiece in the city generates 1 point of loyalty pressure. You can assign the administrator "Tianyu Yazi" to your own city as the governor.
Ako is the administrator of the Disciplinary Committee, like the secretary of Chairman Hina. She can greatly enhance the strategic value of Hinnom Valley City.
Disciplinary Commissioner Tianyu Yazi can be assigned to the city. She takes a long time to install, but can increase the strategic value of the city.
If there is no Hinnom Valley school building in the city, each citizen will provide 2 [ICON_Science] technology value and 1 [ICON_Production] productivity.
The city develops and expands 25% faster.
+75% [ICON_Production] Production for Barracks, Theater Squares, Holy Land Projects and Academy Exchanges.
Unleash 4 Loyalty Pressure on cities within 9 tiles.
Immediately after training a melee unit in this city, you get an identical unit.
Allows construction of "Student Plaza" and "Hot Spring Township" improvements.

+1 [ICON_Faith] faith value, +1 [ICON_Culture] culture value, double the bonus and provide +1 [ICON_Amenities] amenity when adjacent to Xinnen Valley Schoolhouse. Cannot be built next to another student square.

Must be built on Geothermal Fissures. +2 [ICON_Amenities] livability, +3 [ICON_Faith] faith value, [ICON_Culture] culture value, [ICON_Science] technology value. When adjacent to entertainment centers, commercial centers, holy places, and Hinnom Valley school buildings, the above outputs will get an extra +1. The output of [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance is three times that of the cultural value output.
Xinnen Valley's characteristic support unit, unlocked with the technology "Military Engineering", has 4 mobility and vision. Adjacent allies can recover health every round.

Xinnen Valley's characteristic land combat unit, unlocked with the technology "Siege", has 4 mobility. Can carry out long-range siege attacks, if the target is a free city, +10 [ICON_Bombard] bombardment attack power.

The characteristic area of ​​Hinnom Valley is unlocked with the "Education" technology, and the adjacent hills and mountains provide standard [ICON_Science] technology bonuses and a small amount of [ICON_Faith] faith bonuses. This zone releases an additional 0.1 Loyalty Pressure per citizen in the city.

Unique building in the Hinnom Valley Schoolhouse. +2 [ICON_Science] technology value. Provides 3 slots for great works and 1 point for great works ([ICON_GreatWriter][ICON_GreatArtist][ICON_GreatMusician]) each.
Unique building in the Hinnom Valley Schoolhouse. +3 [ICON_Food] food, +3 [ICON_Science] technology value. +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities,
A unique building in the Hinnom Vale Schoolhouse that removes the No Garrison Loyalty debuff. +6 [ICON_Culture] culture value, +10 [ICON_Science] technology value.

Area-based items that require 40 containers to open. After opening, the city gains culture value every round, and greatly reduces the city's habitability and population loyalty pressure. Get a free technology, a free civic and a relic upon completion.

Hina Kurosaki, the chairman of the Disciplinary Committee, has always been devoted to Xinnengu. Hinnom Valley Academy is constantly creating and spreading turmoil, but the enormous energy contained in the unique culture of this academy is unparalleled. I hope your will will be engraved in Hinnom Valley forever, and I wish you and Hinnom Valley a bright future.
Disciplinary Commissioner's Leng Che +15 [ICON_Strength] Combat Power
+{1_num} [ICON_Faith] Faith comes from adjacent Hills tiles.
